data.rationale:
I want develop the Perl Module:SMS::Send::TW::ShareSMS about Send
    SMS from www.shareSMS.com that provide service of send sms by pay
    money.

    Because of the reason that these Website provide service only for
    people in Taiwan , so I want to register the Namespace:
    SMS::Send::TW::ShareSMS.
